about_the_game:
Welcome to KICK ME! - the ultimate multiplayer PvP game where the rooftops are your battlefield! Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping experience as you strive to kick your opponents off the edge while avoiding the same fate. Craft your strategy, master unique abilities and powerful boosts to dominate the competition.

Features:

  • Intense PvP Action: Engage in thrilling player-versus-player battles on dynamic rooftops. Strategize and outmaneuver your opponents to secure victory.

  • Strategic Gameplay: It's not just about kicking; it's about survival. Plan your moves wisely, anticipate your rivals' actions, and stay one step ahead.

  • Unique Abilities: Unleash a variety of special abilities to gain the upper hand. Whether it's a speed boost, a powerful knockback, or a surprise maneuver, choose the right ability at the right time to turn the tide in your favor.

  • Boosts Galore: Keep an eye out for power-boosts scattered across the rooftops. Grab them to enhance your abilities, increase your strength, or gain a temporary advantage over your opponents.

  • Dynamic Environments: Explore a variety of rooftop arenas, each with its own challenges and quirks. Adapt to your surroundings and use them to your advantage in the quest for supremacy.

  • Multiplayer Mayhem: Team up with friends or go solo in intense multiplayer matches. Prove that you have the skills and strategy to be the last kicker standing.

Get ready to experience the thrill of rooftop combat like never before in KICK ME! Are you up for the challenge? Kick, strategize, and dominate!

name: KICK ME!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Athlon II X3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 660 / ATI Radeon
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX560X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space

short_description: Kick opponents off rooftops in KICK ME! Multiplayer PvP madness awaits as you strategize, deploy unique abilities, and grab boosts to secure victory. Navigate dynamic arenas, and be the best kicker! Are you up for the challenge?
